title: 自我感觉国服MC有点欠缺
author: mr_black_cat
txt_content: 我感觉国服MC有点欠缺，总是跟不上国际服的节奏，玩国际服更好吧？

replies.author: 憨憨冰棍
replies.txt_content: 网易，进不了这个社区就想动这个圈 异想天开。

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 恩是的，网易直接把MC拖垮了

replies.author: heiweigoo
replies.txt_content: 网易不行

replies.author: david825
replies.txt_content: 我覺得還好

replies.author: yuen27787231
replies.txt_content: 可能是伺服的選擇太少了吧

replies.author: aaaaawed
replies.txt_content: 进不了这个社区就想动这个

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content: 第一眼看成国建了2333333……

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
网易真的欠打
咳咳，不要暴力，这种公司迟早要完的

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 是的，自从取消MC更新之后我就不想碰了

replies.author: TheRam_
replies.txt_content: 网易只想赚q

replies.author: s_xiaohan
replies.txt_content: 很多欠缺，比如玩家的游戏素质awa

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 你说的是国服的hypixel？

replies.author: WXZn
replies.txt_content: 我也这么认为，喜欢国际服氛围

replies.author: 我好囧2
replies.txt_content: +1网易真的不行把mc都弄得不成样子了

replies.author: COFFE360
replies.txt_content: 国内的minectaft被网易可害惨了，唉悲哀

replies.author: cy59110172
replies.txt_content: 有些外服腐竹不敢把服务器放到中国，黑客多

replies.author: 虚明夜
replies.txt_content: 确实，主要是网易不想去更新

replies.author: Tian_RanDou
replies.txt_content: 十局游戏差不多七八局都有挂，不知道是不是我脸黑

replies.author: lasooooobra
replies.txt_content: 所以还是网易的锅

replies.author: FengSUGou
replies.txt_content: 网易他不行

replies.author: 可塑性记忆
replies.txt_content: 网易他不行的
